name: ukwa-player-ext
description: UK Web Archive Player Browser Extension
author: UK Web Archive

scripts.clean: rm -rf extension/dist/ && mkdir extension/dist/ && rm -rf build && mkdir build && npm prune && npm install
scripts.zip: git archive -o build/tachyon.zip HEAD:extension && npm run zip:firefox && npm run zip:chrome && rm build/tachyon.zip
scripts.build: npm run clean && gulp && npm run zip
scripts.release: npm run build && npm run release-cws && npm run release-amo
